channel.title: Insta Spanish Lessons
channel.itunes:author: Stacey Tipton Reiman
channel.description: Our interactive podcast contains listening comprehension exercises and grammar lessons for students of all levels. We also discuss travel tips, culture, and more! Fun and easy learning by the author of Musical Spanish and Learn Spanish Verbs Fast.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Free Spanish lessons and listening comprehension exercises (mp3 version)
channel.itunes:summary: Our interactive podcast contains listening comprehension exercises and grammar lessons for students of all levels. We also discuss travel tips, culture, and more! Fun and easy learning by the author of Musical Spanish and Learn Spanish Verbs Fast.
channel.itunes:keywords: spanish, learn spanish, teaching, learning, learn, foreign language, languages, hispanic, latino

item.title: Edition 11: Audio Reading and 1 Syllable Word Accents
item.itunes:author: Stacey Tipton Reiman
item.description: A Spanish Zalacain the Aventuero audio reading (part 7), plus a look at using accents in 1 syllable words. Includes audio worksheet and quiz.
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio reading lesson with grammar lesson and quiz.
item.itunes:summary: An audio reading with grammar lesson on 1 syllable word accent marks, with an audio worksheet and quiz
item.itunes:keywords: spanish, learn spanish, teaching, learning, learn, foreign language, languages, latino, latin, video, vidcast, reading, listening

item.title: Edition 7: Lunfardo, Slang from Buenos Aires
item.itunes:author: Stacey Tipton Reiman
item.description: A look at key vocabulary words from lunfardo, the Spanish slang spoken in Buenos Aires and the Rio de la Plata region, with an audio worksheet and quiz.
item.itunes:subtitle: An Argentine Spanish slang lesson with audio quiz.
item.itunes:summary: A look at key vocabulary words from lunfardo, the Spanish slang spoken in Buenos Aires and the Rio de la Plata region, with an audio worksheet and quiz..
item.itunes:keywords: spanish, learn spanish, teaching, learning, learn, foreign language, languages, latino, latin, slang, lunfardo, argentina, buenos aires, tango, rio de la plata

item.title: Edition 6: Listening Comprehension, Zalacain Part 4
item.itunes:author: Stacey Tipton
item.description: A Spanish guided reading with vocabulary review and a grammar pointer on the imperfect subjunctive word fuese, for intermediate to advanced Spanish students, a continuation of the Zalacain el Aventurero story.
item.itunes:subtitle: A Spanish guided reading with audio quiz.
item.itunes:summary: A Spanish guided reading with vocabulary review for intermediate to advanced Spanish students, a continuation of the Zalacain el Aventurero story.
item.itunes:keywords: spanish, learn spanish, teaching, learning, learn, foreign language, languages, latino, latin, subjunctive, verbs, verb, fuese, zalacain
